title: Ep 75: Strand by Strand with Celebrity Hair Colorist Sharon Dorram
itunes:title: Ep 75: Strand by Strand with Celebrity Hair Colorist Sharon Dorram
itunes:subtitle: Celebrity colorist Sharon Dorram is the queen of expensive-looking hair. On this episode, she tells us how to communicate with your colorist, revive your dye job, and even sort out your skin. (Working on the Upper East Side, this woman knows every...
description:
Celebrity colorist Sharon Dorram is the queen of expensive-looking hair. On this episode, she tells us how to communicate with your colorist, revive your dye job, and even sort out your skin. (Working on the Upper East Side, this woman knows every beauty secret there is.) Before that, we talk the MTV VMAs, recycling, and Macron's beauty budget.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
